# RedcapLite

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

`RedcapLite` is an R package that provides a lightweight interface for managing and processing REDCap data. This package aims to simplify data management workflows for REDCap projects, offering essential tools for data manipulation and validation. ['REDCap'](https://projectredcap.org) (Research Electronic Data CAPture) is a secure web application for building and managing online surveys and databases, developed at Vanderbilt University.

## Features

- Streamlined data export from REDCap via API
- Basic data preprocessing and cleaning functions
- Simple validation checks for data quality
- Lightweight alternative to full-scale REDCap management packages

## Installation

You can install the development version of RedcapLite from GitHub:

```r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("username/RedcapLite")
```

## Usage

Here's a basic example of how to use RedcapLite:

```r
library(RedcapLite)

# Connect to your REDCap project
project <- redcap_connect(url = "your_redcap_url",
                         token = "your_api_token")

# Export data
data <- redcap_export(project)

# Basic data validation
validation_report <- validate_data(data)
```
